definitions.definition: A soldier belonging to a legion ; a professional soldier of the ancient Roman army .
A person who is neither a citizen nor colonial/imperial subject of the state whose military they join.
A member of a legion , such as the American Legion , or of any organization containing the term legion in its title ( e.g. the French Foreign Legion ).

main_definition: ( military , Ancient Rome ) A soldier belonging to a legion ; a professional soldier of the ancient Roman army .
secondary_definitions: A person who is neither a citizen nor colonial/imperial subject of the state whose military they join.
A member of a legion , such as the American Legion , or of any organization containing the term legion in its title ( e.g. the French Foreign Legion ).
